title: Martin Amis The age of horrorism
description:
On the eve of the fifth anniversary of 9/11, one of Britain&#039;s most celebrated and original writers analyses - and abhors - the rise of extreme Islamism. In a penetrating and wide-ranging essay he offers a trenchant critique of the grotesque creed and questions the West&#039;s faltering response to this eruption of evil.

Martin Amis
Sunday September 10, 2006
The Observer 

This article can be read on The observer web site, I just put it together in rtf format.
